title: Ground News - Bay Area woman in South Africa working with others to get rid of landmines in war-torn countries
text: Making her mark on International Women's Day is a Bay Area mother and grandmother who's traveling the globe -- helping to rid the world of landmines and lift the voices of women in war-torn countries.
